reviewText: This product was not as expected the words flashed too fast. Not suitable for preschool readers and music was to hyper.
I gave this to my friend for a baby shower gift--- she had it on her amazon baby registry--- she loves it--- cute and fun songs for kids!

The songs are good but they have too many words in them for small children to remember. I think the child's age range for this product should be age eight and above.

Grace and Mercy

This is a great worship dvd for kids
great for church and home alike.
Kids love it and so do adults.
